AhcAmplitude.cc

00001 #include <stdexcept>
00002 #include "AhcAmplitude.hh"
00003 
00004 namespace CALICE
00005 {
00010   AhcAmplitude::AhcAmplitude(EVENT::LCGenericObject *genericObject)
00011   {
00012     /*
00013       Angela Lucaci-Timoce: the temperature was added in December 2010.
00014       In order to be compatible with files which were reconstructed before,
00015       don't check anymore the number of floats, and also
00016       set the temperature only if there is a temperature defined.
00017       (to be fixed)
00018     */
00019 
00020     if (genericObject->getNInt() != kNInts
00021         //|| genericObject->getNFloat() != kNFloats
00022         )
00023       throw std::invalid_argument("AhcAmplitude: suspicious number of elements in this LCGenericObject");
00024     
00025     setCellID(genericObject->getIntVal(kCellID));
00026     setAmplRawADC(genericObject->getFloatVal(kAmplRawADC));
00027     setAmplRawMinusPedestalADC(genericObject->getFloatVal(kAmplRawMinusPedestalADC));
00028     setAmplTemperatureCorrMIP(genericObject->getFloatVal(kAmplTemperatureCorrMIP));
00029     setAmplNOTTemperatureCorrMIP(genericObject->getFloatVal(kAmplNOTTemperatureCorrMIP));
00030     setAmplGeV(genericObject->getFloatVal(kAmplGeV));
00031 
00032     if (genericObject->getNFloat() == kNFloats)
00033       setTemperature(genericObject->getFloatVal(kTemperature));
00034   }
00035 
00038   AhcAmplitude::AhcAmplitude()
00039   {
00040     setCellID(0);
00041     setAmplRawADC(0.);
00042     setAmplRawMinusPedestalADC(0.);
00043     setAmplTemperatureCorrMIP(0.);
00044     setAmplNOTTemperatureCorrMIP(0.);
00045     setAmplGeV(0.);
00046     setTemperature(0);
00047   }

00051   AhcAmplitude::AhcAmplitude(int cellID, 
00052                              float amplRawADC, 
00053                              float amplRawMinusPedestalADC,
00054                              float amplTemperatureCorrMIP, 
00055                              float amplNOTTemperatureCorrMIP, 
00056                              float amplGeV,
00057                              float temperature)
00058   {
00059     setCellID(cellID);
00060     setAmplRawADC(amplRawADC);
00061     setAmplRawMinusPedestalADC(amplRawMinusPedestalADC);
00062     setAmplTemperatureCorrMIP(amplTemperatureCorrMIP);
00063     setAmplNOTTemperatureCorrMIP(amplNOTTemperatureCorrMIP);
00064     setAmplGeV(amplGeV);
00065     setTemperature(temperature);
00066   }

00068   void AhcAmplitude::setCellID(const int cellID)
00069   {
00070     setIntVal(kCellID, cellID);
00071   }

00073   const int AhcAmplitude::getCellID()

00076     return cellID;
00077   }
